description.ruby-sapphire:
Covers the user in mud to
raise electrical resistance.
description.emerald:
Covers the user in mud to
raise electrical resistance.
description.firered-leafgreen:
Weakens ELECTRIC-
type attacks while
the user is in the
battle.
description.diamond-pearl:
The user covers
itself with mud. It
weakens Electric-
type moves while the
user is in the battle.

The user covers
itself with mud. It
weakens Electric-
type moves while the
user is in the battle.

description.x-y:
The user covers itself with mud.
This weakens Electric-type moves
for five turns.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire:
The user covers itself with mud.

for five turns.
description.sun-moon:
The user kicks up mud on the battlefield. This
weakens Electric-type moves for five turns.

description.sword-shield:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

effect.full: electric moves inflict half damage, regardless of target.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.
